        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6356</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Elizabeth Bishop - Trivia Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Elizabeth Bishop – Cuestionario tipo Trivial</string>
            <string language="ga">Elizabeth Bishop – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elizabeth Bishop - Trivia Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évêque d'Elizabeth - Jeu de Trivia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bishop De Elizabeth - Quiz De Trivia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bishop Di Elizabeth - Quiz Di Trivia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων Elizabeth Bishop - Trivia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">To revise the poet's life, to gain information on the poet.</string>
            <string language="es">Para revisar la vida de la poetisa y obtener información sobre ella.</string>
            <string language="ga">Dul siar ar shaol an fhile, chun eolas a fháil ar an bhfile.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Lebensdauer des Dichters verbessern, um 
Informationen über den Dichter zu gewinnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour mettre à jour la vie du poèt, pour obtenir
l'information sur le poèt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para revisar a vida do poeta, para ganhar a 
informação no poeta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per modificare la vita del poet, per ottenere le 
informazioni sul poet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για να αναθεωρήσει τη ζωή του ποιητή, για να λάβει τις
πληροφορίες για τον ποιητή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
